did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Association for Diplomatic Studies and Training "The Labor Diplomacy Oral History Project" Audio-Visual Materials, 1900-1995

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Association for Diplomatic Studies and Training

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Transcripts of interviews with John P. Windmuller and Margaret L. Plunkett.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The transcripts for both an Interview with John P. Windmuller conducted for the Labor Diplomacy Oral History Project by Morris Weisz on January 27, 1995 and an Interview with Margaret L. Plunkett conducted for the Labor Diplomacy Oral History Project by Thomas D. Bowie on July 28, 1995.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
